code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/BookingModal.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BookingModal(_ref){let{tables}=_ref;const[show,setShow]=useState(false);const[selected,setSelected]=useState(null);const tableId=t=>t._id||t.id||t.name;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking-modal-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-primary",onClick:()=>setShow(true),children:"Book a Table"}),show&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",onClick:()=>setShow(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Select a Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"table-list-modal",children:tables.map(t=>{const id=tableId(t);const available=typeof t.available==='boolean'?t.available:true;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"table-btn ".concat(available?'':'unavailable'," ").concat(selected===id?'selected':''),disabled:!available,onClick:()=>setSelected(id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"table-name",children:t.name||"Table ".concat(id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"table-meta",children:["Capacity: ",t.capacity||'—',t.location?" \xB7 ".concat(t.location):'']})]},id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:8,marginTop:12},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-primary",disabled:!selected,onClick:()=>{/* booking flow to implement */setShow(false);},children:"Confirm Booking"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-secondary",onClick:()=>setShow(false),children:"Cancel"})]})]})})]});}export default BookingModal;
